summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1606, for the improvement of Phinney Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from North Fiftieth Street to North Sixty-fifth Street, by constructing concrete sidewalks, together with wooden crosswalks and necessary drainage, under Ordinance No. 17168 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
